promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young simple lynx fire-type pokemon wearing a dark mask. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyrolynx, a a young simple lynx fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Heat Burn, Sitdown Splash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "fire" or "Pyrolynx". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, lynx-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: This feline ignites its fur to display dominance in its volcanic homes. Abilities include harnessing heated blows and molten splashes.
